dcterms:creator: V. Garcia
S. Bonhoeffer
F. Fu
dcterms:description: A minimal dynamical model of immune-tumor interaction that considers a population of tumor cells and immune cells in the tumor microenvironment, allowing for the acquisition of adaptive immune resistance and the effects of immune checkpoint blockades.
dcterms:title: Minimal Dynamical Model of Immune-Tumor Interaction

dcterms:creator: D. Kirschner
J. C. Panetta
dcterms:description: Prior mathematical models of cancer-immune interactions that provide foundational insights into the dynamics of immunotherapy.
dcterms:title: Mathematical Models of Cancer-Immune Interactions

dcterms:creator: L. G. de Pillis
A. E. Radunskaya
C. L. Wiseman
dcterms:description: A validated mathematical model of cell-mediated immune response to tumor growth that explores the interactions between immune cells and tumor cells.
dcterms:title: Validated Mathematical Model of Cell-Mediated Immune Response

dcterms:creator: R. Serre
S. Benzekry
L. Padovani
C. Meille
N. Andr√©
J. Ciccolini
F. Barlesi

D. Barbolosi
dcterms:description: Mathematical modeling of cancer immunotherapy and its synergy with radiotherapy, providing insights into treatment dynamics and interactions.
dcterms:title: Mathematical Modeling of Cancer Immunotherapy and Synergy with Radiotherapy

dcterms:creator: C. Gong
O. Milberg
B. Wang
P. Vicini
R. Narwal
L. Roskos
A. S. Popel
dcterms:description: A computational multiscale agent-based model for simulating spatio-temporal tumor immune response to PD-1 and PD-L1 inhibition.
dcterms:title: Computational Multiscale Agent-Based Model for Tumor Immune Response
